bug.short_desc: selinux-policy-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch fails to install properly on Fedora Rawhide
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Upgrading : selinux-policy-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch 9/185 neverallow check failed at line 8884 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/base/cil (neverallow base_typeattr_12 unlabeled_t (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 545 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/400/docker/cil (allow spc_t unlabeled_t (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 828 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/sandboxX/cil (allow sandbox_x_domain exec_type (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 1592 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/virt/cil (allow virtd_lxc_t exec_type (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 1966 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/virt/cil (allow svirt_sandbox_domain exec_type (file (entrypoint)))
Failed to generate binary semodule: Failed! Upgrading : linux-firmware-20160609-66.gita4bbc811.fc25.noarch 10/185 Installing : kernel-debug-core-4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.fc25.x86_64 11/185 Installing : kernel-core-4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.fc25.x86_64 12/185
selinux policy fails with below error when updating Fedora rawhide --- Installing : kernel-modules-4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.fc25.x86_64 13/185 Installing : kernel-debug-modules-4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.fc25.x86_64 14/185 Upgrading : selinux-policy-targeted-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch 15/185 neverallow check failed at line 8884 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/base/cil (neverallow base_typeattr_12 unlabeled_t (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 545 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/400/docker/cil (allow spc_t unlabeled_t (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 828 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/sandboxX/cil (allow sandbox_x_domain exec_type (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 1592 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/virt/cil (allow virtd_lxc_t exec_type (file (entrypoint))) <root> allow at line 1966 of /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/100/virt/cil (allow svirt_sandbox_domain exec_type (file (entrypoint)))
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
Fedora rawhide latest
How reproducible:
try to update seliux policy selinux-policy-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch
Steps to Reproduce: see above
Actual results:
selinux-policy-13.1-195.fc25.noarch update fails,
Expected results: selinux update to work
Additional info: This is Fedora rawhide installation with latest packages ( daily updated )

I am not seeing this problem with
rpm -q docker-selinux docker-selinux-1.11.2-5.git4ddbd3d.fc25.x86_64

Today's update was fine without error message reported in #1. Selinux related packages [1] installed now
[1] rpm -qa | grep selinux libselinux-python3-2.5-6.fc25.x86_64 libselinux-python-2.5-6.fc25.x86_64 libselinux-2.5-6.fc25.i686 rpm-plugin-selinux-4.13.0-0.rc1.37.fc25.x86_64 selinux-policy-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch selinux-policy-targeted-3.13.1-195.fc25.noarch libselinux-2.5-6.fc25.x86_64 docker-selinux-1.11.2-5.git4ddbd3d.fc25.x86_64 libselinux-utils-2.5-6.fc25.x86_64 libselinux-devel-2.5-6.fc25.x86_64
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.
